title: Revenue of Starwood Hotels & Resorts 2005 to 2015
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Revenue in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
In general Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has stayed the same over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2005 to 2007, slightly decreasing from 2007 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2015.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, of value 6.32 was reached at Year 2012
Minimum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 4.7 was reached at Year 2009
